Few basic things you will need to build to be a freelancer are : Have a working profile in all freelance work sourcing sites.Have a nicely built website.Build a blog that reflects your talent and edge over others.Be present in sites such as Quora, they are boon for freelancers to spread the voice to many.Start building the profile one after one in freelancer sites.
